CustomField.description: Percentage of hours completed, for revenue forecasts using the % Complete recognition method. For more information, see the PSA Help.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Percentage of hours completed, for Revenue Forecasts using the "% Complete" recognition method. The value is (Sum of approved timecard hours/Value in field selected from Total Hours Field on Project picklist on Forecast Setup record) multiplied by 100.
CustomField.label: % Hours Completed for Recognition
